thread.title: BRIEF-BGIS To Acquire Large Portfolio Of Carillion Facilities Management Contracts In UK

title: BRIEF-BGIS To Acquire Large Portfolio Of Carillion Facilities Management Contracts In UK

organizations.name: facilities management contracts in uk reuters

text: February 14, 2018 / 4:07 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-BGIS To Acquire Large Portfolio Of Carillion Facilities Management Contracts In UK Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - BGIS: * BGIS TO ACQUIRE A LARGE PORTFOLIO OF CARILLION FACILITIES MANAGEMENT CONTRACTS IN THE UNITED KINGDOM * BGIS - ENTERED INTO DEAL WITH SPECIAL MANAGER FOR OFFICIAL RECEIVER TO BUY LARGE PORTFOLIO OF CARILLION FACILITY MANAGEMENT CONTRACTS IN UK * BGIS - UNDER DEAL,BGIS TO BUY PORTFOLIO OF UK CONTRACTS FOR DELIVERY OF SERVICES IN HOSPITAL, EDUCATION, JUSTICE, TRANSPORT,EMERGENCY SERVICES MARKETS * BGIS SAYS ‍MORE THAN 2500 CARILLION EMPLOYEES WILL JOIN BGIS TEAM UPON CLOSING​ OF DEAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
